reviewText: Learned about region codes. This set is made for UK only not USA. Had to return it.
A fun series. Bear in mind that it is Region 2 and will require a (hopeful) tweak of the DVR's software.
Great show. Wish I could watch it.  Doesn't play on my U.S.  Bluray player.

I only recently started watching Doctor Who  (both classic and new) Sarah Jane quickly became my favorite companion, when I found out she had her own spinoff I had to have a set. Although it is geared toward a younger audience. I still find it enjoyable. RIP Elisabeth Sladen you will forever be my favorite!

*I would like to note this particular boxset is region 2 and requires a multiregion dvd player to view*
Wanted it so bad I bought a region free player just for this set...
Beware, region 2 only. Otherwise, since I found a viewer, it is perfect for any Whovian.
Fun series which had a limited viewing in the US.  Glad to have a complete set.
Great series , But I am very sad that Elizabeth Sladen past away in 2011
